CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 17, 1970, pg. 22, reads: "Operation; Christmas Baskets - The Pittsburgh Hustlers Athletic Club distributed baskets of food to deserving families in the community.  Since August 1965, this has been an annual project of the club and this year 15 baskets were prepared by the members.  Members kneeling, left to right: L. Lowry, A. Gregory (Chairman), D. Maban, J. Johnson, J. Owens, W. Butler, C. Lowry and Andrew Burley, Sales Rep., Coca Cola Co.  Standing left to right: T. Watkins, J. Hull, B. Bennermon, R. Hill, L. Meggett, W. Cureton (Pres.), L. Davis, M. Coleman, R. Chambers, G. Patterson, H. Simpson.  Other members no shown:  S. Cureton, H. Smith, R. Patterson, L. Lines, D. Peek, S. Thompkins, and R. Scott."
TitMainTitle: Members of Pittsburgh Hustlers Athletic Club, some wearing softball champion jackets, kneeling from left: L. Lowry, A. Gregory, D. Maban, J. Johnson, J. Owens, W. Butler, C. Lowry, Andrew Burley; standing: T. Watkins, J. Hull, B. Bennermon, R. Hill, L. Meggett, W. Cureton, L. Davis, M. Coleman, R. Chambers, G. Patterson, H. Simpson, posed for food drive
